org.rapla.mobile.android.activity

Class AppointmentListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • org.rapla.mobile.android.activity.BaseActivity
        • org.rapla.mobile.android.activity.AppointmentListActivity

  • public class AppointmentListActivity
extends BaseActivity
    The appointment list screen allows the user to show, add, edit and display all appointments assigned to the current reservation.
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      AppointmentItemClickListener This class handles click events on appointment list items.

      AppointmentItemDeletionDialogListener This class handles the dialog for confirming deleting an appointment
      private class  AppointmentListActivity.SelectedAppointmentActionHandler
      SelectedAppointmentActionHandler This class handles all actions related to an appointment selected from the list view.

      • getListAdapter

        public AppointmentAdapter getListAdapter()
        The list adapter cannot be kept as an instance attribute as for some reason, as soon as passing the reference to the async task for loading appointments, the reference gets lost. So always retrieve it on the fly from the list view.
        Returns:
        Casted list adapter of list view
